title: The Lightbulb Strikes Back
description:
Humans have a long history of inventions: electricity, telephones, computers, music — the list goes on. It's clear we're shaping the world around us.

But as Ainissa Ramirez explains in her new book, The Alchemy of Us, those inventions are shaping us, too.

itunes:title: The Lightbulb Strikes Back
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We chat with material scientist Ainissa Ramirez about her new book, The Alchemy of Us.
itunes:subtitle: We chat with material scientist Ainissa Ramirez about her new book, The Alchemy of Us.
content:encoded:
Humans have a long history of inventions: electricity, telephones, computers, music — the list goes on. It's clear we're shaping the world around us.

But as Ainissa Ramirez explains in her new book, The Alchemy of Us, those inventions are shaping us, too.
